text: Tōmālōkē sē'i sampradāẏara lagata yud'dha nakaraibānē, yisakalē nijara pratiśrauti bhaṅga karaichē ārau raāchulaka ōlā'i diẏāra bābē saṅkalpa karaichila? Ārau siham̐tē'i prathamē tōmālōkara lagata (yud'dha) ārambha karaichē. Tōmālōkē siham̐taka bhaẏa karaā nēki? Āllāhaka bhaẏa karaāhē tōmālōkara bābē bēchi samīcīna yadi tōmālōkē (prakr̥ta) mumina
